hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Happy Mask Shop#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Card# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #6# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: When the moon hits Termina like a big pizza pie that's game over.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Market#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Lens of Truth# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.
hinted_locations: Hideout Break Room Hall to Balcony Wonderitem

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #3# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #time#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Like Like Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that at the #bottom of Zora's Fountain# lies #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say you can cut corners to get to your destination faster.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
